title: iPad Team Schedule
custom_preconds:
1.) Config Values that control data range

You need to change the version parameter for the version you are working on:

http://qa-atbatappconfig.mlb.com/ios/9.4.0/ipadConfig.json
http://qa-atbatappconfig.mlb.com/ios/9.4.0/iphoneConfig.json

"supportedSeasons":  {"2016":{"first_allowed_day":"20160228","last_allowed_day":"20161002","suggested_day":"20160228"}},

2.) In case you need to use Charles Proxy to locally map to for Plan a Trip (see attached for dummy file with text)

Map from:
http://m.mlb.com/gen/content/tag/v1/key-value/atbat-planatrip/ari/general-v3.json (points to ARI but change Club ID param)
http://qa.mlb.com/gen/content/tag/v1/key-value/atbat-planatrip/ari/general-v3.json (points to ARI but change Club ID param)

Map to:
Attached file

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on the More then Team Schedules then selects a team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the current month's schedule will be brought up

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has a Favorite Team set and taps on More tab then taps on Team Schedules
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see
- MLB.com logo and a Downloading Schedule text with loading spinner
- Current month's schedule will load

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user does not have a Favorite Team set and taps on More tab then taps on Team Schedules
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see
-Back button to return to More Menu
-Select a Team button (instead of a team's logo)
-Team selector popover underneath

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on More tab then taps on Team Schedules
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see:
-appropriate team's word mark will be displayed over team's color in the header
-team's schedule will load

Repeat for all teams

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Team Schedule for a team and attempts to scroll vertically
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we will see that we are bound to the dates set inside of the configuration file

"first_allowed_day":"YYYYMMDD"
"last_allowed_day":"YYYYMMDD"

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Team Schedule for a team and views a game that is not completed yet
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see a W or L on that date cell

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on More tab and then Team Schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we will see that today's Date has the text 'Today' in the bottom left corner of the cell

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on More tab and then Team Schedule and is on a team's schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the home games will have the team's color

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on the Team Schedule and taps on the Today button at the bottom toolbar
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the view is moved to Today's Month/Date

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on Team Schedules and taps on Download in the bottom bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user receives an UI Alert asking if the user wants to subscribe to the calendar "teamname" with the following prompts:

Cancel - closes the Dialog
Subscribe - Subscribes user to the team's calendar and calendar is then downloaded to device calendar

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on Team Schedules and taps on Plan a Trip

**Might need to follow step 2 to locally map it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then an action sheet opens with a list of Trip items, each tappable to open a webview, and including:

Name
Icon
Webview URL

The Action Sheet options should be configurable per team.

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on a Team Schedule and taps on a date cell with a star icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Gameday (Game Preview) will open and a Promo link will be available

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on a Team Schedule and taps on a date cell with a T icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Gameday (Game Preview) will open and a Ticket link will be available

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on a Team Schedule and taps on a date cell with Live
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Gameday will open for the game in progress

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is on a Team Schedule and taps on date cell that has W or L
When a user is viewing the Team Schedule and has low connectivity
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the view will timeout 30 seconds
and then display the last available dat with the following:

Message: "Low Connectivity: using last available data
Button: "OK"
